title: Maze Simulator

title: Kanji Ji App
description: A kanji dictionary web app to help users learn and explore Japanese kanji characters.

title: Coyo6

title: Optical Character Recognition
description: A project that captures or selects images, extracts text in real time using google_mlkit_text_recognition, and reads it aloud via text-to-speech (TTS).
